home.mission: Our mission is to make code sharing simple
home.team: We're a team of developers who believe that code collaboration should be easy and accessible to everyone.
home.hero_desc: A modern platform for developers to create, share, and collaborate on code snippets in real-time.
home.features_subtitle: Everything you need for code sharing
home.features_desc: Our platform provides all the tools you need to collaborate efficiently.
home.features_1_desc: Multiple users can edit code simultaneously with instant updates for everyone.
home.features_2_desc: Support for multiple programming languages with beautiful syntax highlighting.
home.features_3_desc: Easily share your code snippets through secure links - perfect for quick collaboration.
home.features_4_desc: Run your code directly in the browser to see results instantly - perfect for testing and learning.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: ATVSS CodeShare is a platform that allows developers to write, save, and share code snippets with others. It supports multiple programming languages and provides syntax highlighting for better readability.
faq.q2: Do I need an account to use ATVSS CodeShare?
faq.a2_1: You can use the code editor without an account, but you'll need to create an account to save your code snippets and access them later. Creating an account is free and only takes a minute.
faq.a3_1: ATVSS CodeShare currently supports JavaScript, Python, Java, C#, C++, PHP, HTML, and CSS. We're constantly working on adding support for more languages.
faq.q4: Can I collaborate with others on a code snippet?
faq.a4_1: Currently, ATVSS CodeShare allows you to share your code snippets with others via a link. Real-time collaboration features are on our roadmap and will be available in future updates.
faq.a5: You can choose whether your code snippets are public or private. Public snippets can be viewed by anyone with the link, while private snippets are only accessible to you.
faq.q6: Is ATVSS CodeShare free to use?
faq.a6: Yes, ATVSS CodeShare is completely free to use. We may introduce premium features in the future, but the core functionality will always remain free.
